name: angular2-translator
description: A translate-service, translate-pipe and translate-component for angular2

scripts.test: typings install && tsc && karma start --browsers Firefox && npm run map-coverage
scripts.prepublish: typings install && tsc && node bundle.js && sed -i -e 's/-1===\([a-z]\).indexOf(\([a-z]\))/-1===\1.indexOf(\2)||!\2.linkRecord/' bundles/angular2-translator.js
scripts.map-coverage: remap-istanbul -i coverage/unmapped-json/coverage-final.json -o coverage/report-html -t html && remap-istanbul -i coverage/unmapped-json/coverage-final.json -o coverage/lcov.info -t lcovonly && remap-istanbul -i coverage/unmapped-json/coverage-final.json -o coverage/report.json -t json && remap-istanbul -i coverage/unmapped-json/coverage-final.json -t text-summary -o coverage/report-summary.txt && cat coverage/report-summary.txt && echo ''

author: Thomas Flori
